contact.presentation: Lead Developer, naturally curious and passionate about the profession.

summary.content:
I have {{ value }} years of experience as a software developer specializing in information systems.

Primarily focused on backend technologies (Java, Spring...), gained through diverse projects across multiple business domains including aerospace, human resources, and community platforms.

I maintain a full-stack profile through numerous frontend projects developed in parallel with my backend expertise.

I am experienced in Agile methodologies and enjoy collaborative project management approaches (Scrum, Kanban...).

content.dev: Software development across various programming languages and technologies

content.running: Distance running (team participant in Toulouse Marathon)
content.movie: Classic horror cinema from the 80s-90s (Carpenter, Cronenberg, Romero...)
